name: Quiz King of Fighters
overview:
Quiz King Of Fighters was developed by SNK and published by Viccom and Saurus in 1995.

A quiz game based on various Neo-Geo characters.

The charaters to select from are:
Nakoruru (from Samurai Showdown)
Mai (from Fatal Fury 2)
Robert (from Art Of Fighting 3 - The Path Of The Warrior)
Terry (from Fatal Fury)
Hoahmaru (from Samurai Showdown)
Ryu (from Art Of Fighting)

You have ten seconds to answer the question. If you miss three questions, the game is over, but you can continue with additional credits. The joystick is only used to select your character and to choose between crossroads on the map; the rest of the game uses the four buttons.
